{{disambig-two|the hobbit|the trees of the same name|[[rowans]]}} {{infobox character | people=[[Hobbits|Hobbit]] | name=Rowan | image= | caption= | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[Hobbiton]]
[[Tighfield]] | affiliation= | language= | birth={{SR|1249}} | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | family=[[Greenhand Family|Greenhand]] | parentage=[[Holman the greenhanded]] | siblings=[[Halfred Greenhand|Halfred]], [[Erling]], [[Hending]] and [[Rose (daughter of Holman)|Rose]] | spouse=[[Hob Gammidge]] | children=[[Hobson]] | gender=Female | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Rowan''' was the oldest child of [[Holman the greenhanded]]. ==History== Rowan married [[Hob Gammidge]], a roper from [[Tighfield]]. They had one son, [[Hobson]], who became a roper like his father.{{App|Gamgee}}, p. 1105 ==Etymology== A ''[[wikipedia:Rowan|Rowan]]'' is [[Rowans|a type of tree]], the European mountain ash. The name is of Scandinavian origin akin to [[Norse]] ''rau√∞'' ("red"), because of its red berries.[[Jim Allan]] (ed.), ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', "Giving of Names" {{references}} [[Category:Gamgee]] [[Category:Greenhand]] [[Category:Hobbits]] [[Category:Third Age characters]] [[de:Rowan Gammidsch]] [[fr:encyclo/personnages/hobbits/la mainverte/rowan]] [[fi:Pihlaja (hobitti)]]
